subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees' first-base coach said on Sunday of the team's catcher Jorge Posada: ''Jorge can catch until he's 45. It would not surprise me, and don't get surprised if he does that.''
snippet: The Yankees' first-base coach said on Sunday of the team's catcher Jorge Posada: ''Jorge can catch until he's 45. It would not surprise me, and don't get surprised if he does that.''
